channel.title: Wtf with actiontimer?

item.title: Wtf with actiontimer?
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

i can click only every 20 seconds and now i dont get exp ont the portal.
i use enkrona source.

if(objectID == 2466 && objectX == 3091 && objectY == 3493) {
if(actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[0] < 99) {
sendMessage(“You gain strength experience!”);
actionTimer = 6;
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[3]), 3);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
} else
if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) {
sendMessage(“You can no longer train here.”);
}
else if(trainTimer != 0) {
throttleActions();
}
}
if(objectID == 2469) {
if(actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[1] < 99) {
sendMessage(“You gain defence experience!”);
actionTimer = 6;
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[3]), 3);
setAnimation(0x326);
}
} else
if(playerLevel[1] >= 99) {
sendMessage(“You can no longer train here.”);
}
else if(trainTimer != 0) {
throttleActions();
}
}
if(objectID == 2470) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[0] < 99) {
sendMessage(“You gain attack experience!”);
actionTimer = 6;
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[3]), 3);
}
} else
if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) {
sendMessage(“You can no longer train here.”);
}
else if(trainTimer != 0) {
throttleActions();
}
}
if(objectID == 2477 && objectX == 3092 && objectY == 3489) {
if(actionTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[4] < 99) {
sendMessage(“You gain range experience!”);
actionTimer = 6;
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[4]), 4);
addSkillXP((25playerLevel[3]), 3);
setAnimation(0x320);
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2008, 06:56:17 PM[/size][hr]plzzzzzzzzzzzz helppppppppppppppppp
